title: Can a woman travel alone on a plane if her father drops her & her brother receives her?
transcript: I blew used her from Saudi Arabia says that his daughter teenage wants to go from Riyadh to Jeddah to visit her brother can she travel alone in an airplane he will drop her to the airport and her brother would receive her once she arrives in Jeddah Airport so it's only the flight which is about an hour flight this is that okay well the most adequate and suitable person to answer your question would be the prophet alayhi salaatu wa salaam the Prophet said salah lara salem it is not permissible for a woman who believes in allah and the day of judgment to travel without a Muharram ask your daughter when you're on the plane from Riyadh to Jeddah are you travelling or not if she says yes then the Prophet has answered her and this is totally not permissible
